name: revdj
text: This strip made me fall in love with Philippe.  He had probably been practicing "shake hands with the host, and thank him for the invite" ALL DAY.

name: jstegall
text: haha I've never thought about that, but it is so true.

name: thatcrazycommie
text: Which is especially funny because he stuck out the wrong hand, confusing Teodor.

name: baryonyx
text: And there's a strong possibility Teodor was the one he asked to teach him the proper etiquette, on top of that.

name: kelsotimebomb
text:
The first time I read this strip, I thought Philippe was reaching for T's cigarette.

What is wrong with me?

name: wjon
text: This is my second time through now, but all the way through the first I remembered this comment. Chubbied.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: How come nobody smokes in achewood anymore?

name: ssddr
text: DIABETUS

name: rowboat
text: Can't say, but Téodor's is just social. Not lit. Same one all night. That kind of thing.

name: zapatos
text: Ray's advice column got too many cigarette death questions, scaring Onstad away from the coffin nails.

name: deancain29
text: Philippes handshake is the best thing ever. EVER I re-enact this whenever possible.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: I know, that hint of tension replaced with a faint smile once the handshake is accomplished... great stuff.

name: overmedicated
text: Why are they shaking with adjacent hands/paws/flippers?

name: 1000hz
text: Because Lie Bot taught Philippe how to shake hands.

name: imitationcrab
text: Maybe Teodor knows that shaking hands with your left hand is bad luck.  Despite Phillipe using his left hand, T goes ahead and uses the correct hand.  I mean... that's what I do anyway.

name: landowmpg
text: I just assumed that Philippe got it wrong, and T didn't feel like changing which hand the cigarette was in.

name: sargasm
text: That's a pretty sweet hat Lie Bot is sporting.

name: never_die
text: Teodor looks pretty fancy in panel 2.

name: spectre
text: Alt text: "A handshake."

name: evolume
text:
PREVIOUSLY
Phillipe's Mom: "Wear a tie, and remember to shake hands with the host. Also tell him 'Thank you for inviting me to your party.' Your father will be watching you from Heaven after all."

name: boswelljn
text: When I see frame three, the theme from Star Wars kicks in.

name: madnes
text: Opening score to "2001", for me.

name: i_love_kate
text:
Evidently, a whole day has passed since the first strip.

Also, I believe Philippe is shaking with his left hands in accordance with ancient Scout tradition. Although probably not.

name: aurorasbored
text: IT'S A CHILD MOLESTER. Whoops, skipping ahead.

name: red-barchetta
text: Ray has his nipples and belly button but as of yet hasn't packed on the pounds. No gut lines.

name: donnatron
text:
I think this strip should definitely be rated higher. It's perfect Philippe.

And WHY did I not get an account sooner? The world may never know.

name: tekende
text: That party is a total sausage-fest.

name: greenkoolayd
text: achewood is a total sausagefest

name: kingcrimson
text: Did Lyle, Cornelius and Philippe just get invited to a party at their own house?
